speaker: Agent
text: Hi, this is Mike with XYZ Collections. I'm calling about your unpaid balance. How are you doing today?

speaker: Customer
text: I'm doing well, thank you. How can I help you?

speaker: Agent
text: Before we get into that, can you confirm your birth date for me?

speaker: Agent
text: Alright, and can you also provide your current address?

speaker: Agent
text: Thanks for verifying that. You have an outstanding balance of $1,200. What the hell are you planning to do about it?

speaker: Customer
text: I'm currently reviewing my options and will make a payment soon.

speaker: Agent
text: Reviewing options? What kind of bullshit is that? You need to pay up now!

speaker: Customer
text: I understand the urgency, but I need a little more time to arrange the funds.

speaker: Agent
text: Time? You think you can just sit on your ass and not pay your debts? Get real!

speaker: Customer
text: I assure you that I'm taking this seriously and will communicate my plan shortly.

speaker: Agent
text: You better do it fast, or I'm going to escalate this, you got that?

speaker: Customer
text: I understand. Thank you for your call, Mike.

speaker: Agent
text: Whatever, just make sure you don't screw this up again.
